name: ROCKWOOD INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE PLAN and John R. Murphy, c/o Pennsylvania Automobile Insurance Plan, and Pennsylvania Insurance Department
name_abbreviation: Rockwood Insurance v. Pennsylvania Automobile Insurance

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: ROCKWOOD INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE PLAN and John R. Murphy, c/o Pennsylvania Automobile Insurance Plan, and Pennsylvania Insurance Department.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Alfred Sarowitz, Philadelphia, for Rockwood Ins. Co.
M. Hannah Leavitt, Paul Laskow, Harrisburg, for Pa. Ins. Dept.
John J. McLean, Jr., Pittsburgh, Martin J. Hertz, New York City, for Pa. Auto. Ins. Plan.
casebody.head_matter:
518 A.2d 265
ROCKWOOD INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE PLAN and John R. Murphy, c/o Pennsylvania Automobile Insurance Plan, and Pennsylvania Insurance Department.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 4, 1986.
Decided Dec. 10, 1986.
Alfred Sarowitz, Philadelphia, for Rockwood Ins. Co.
M. Hannah Leavitt, Paul Laskow, Harrisburg, for Pa. Ins. Dept.
John J. McLean, Jr., Pittsburgh, Martin J. Hertz, New York City, for Pa. Auto. Ins. Plan.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
